xeno.remoting.web

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • xeno.remoting.web.Request

  • public class Request
extends Object

    A wrapped HttpServletRequest object, integrated and encapsulated the original HTTP servlet request methods. This object just provides those methods which are most frequently using in the web application, you could call method getOriginalHttpServletRequest() to get the original HTTP servlet request instance you are current using.

    Author:
    Kai Feng

    • Method Detail

      • getOriginalHttpServletRequest

        public javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest getOriginalHttpServletRequest()

        Returns the original HTTP servlet request instance you are current using. Because the feature of the AJAX based web application, stream data (handled by the MessageServlet during each request), traditional URL dispatch (No any URL redirect or dispatch), or status reset (override by the MessageServlet during each response) will no longer keep behaviors as before.

        Returns:
        The object, never be null.

      • getLocale

        Please see ServletRequest.getLocale() for details.

      • getHeaderMap

        public HashMap<String,Object> getHeaderMap()

        Returns the header in a map with key-value pairs.

        Returns:
        The map, never be null.
